useCase.name: Manage Privacy Settings

preconditions.precondition: User must be able to access privacy settings

useCase.trigger: User requests to access or adjust privacy settings

mainSequence.step: User requests to access privacy settings
Settings retrieve current settings from Storage
Storage returns current settings to Settings
Settings displays current privacy settings on GUI
GUI shows privacy settings options to User
User adjusts privacy and data settings on GUI
GUI updates settings as per User's request
Settings saves new settings to Storage
Settings confirms update to User on GUI
GUI displays success message to User
